note:
I'm a generative artist based out of Ridgewood, Queens! I focus on combining advanced technologies and robotics with old-school tools and mediums, using technical pens, brushes, fountain pens, specialty inks, and high quality papers, to explore the space between the Digital World, and the Analog. Using a pen-plotter robot, My focus ranges from the code-based abstract, to surreal imagery inspired by artificial intelligence, to photo-realism.
Check out my website, www.Wendt.Art!
